description: Now you can control your SkyBell HD video doorbell with Alexa and the Amazon Echo! You can enjoy more security by starting live video recordings or taking snapshots at the front door. You can also turn off the indoor chime in your house so a visitor doesnâ€™t wake up a napping baby or interrupt quiet time. To get started, register a SkyBell account, activate the skill and then link your account with the prompts.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, tell SkyBell to turn on quiet mode.
Alexa, tell SkyBell to take a snapshot.
Alexa, tell SkyBell to record video.
name: SkyBell
shortDescription: Control your SkyBell HD video doorbell, including live video recordings!
